About Us

Located in the Chicago area, Combat Zone is one of the worldâ€™s most credentialed martial arts programs. We train people of all skill levels and all ages in the most effective and reliable martial arts systems in the world. Since 2000 Team Combat Zone has specialized in Mixed Martial Arts, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, and Muay Thai Kickboxing. Our training programs are perfect for those looking to get in amazing shape in our fitness programs, learn self defense in our martial arts classes or to train to compete in mixed martial arts. No matter what skill level you have in martial arts, Combat Zone can help you become the best version of you with our world class coaches and friendly environment.

We teach...

  • Boxing
  • Kickboxing
  • Muay Thai
  • Jiu Jitsu (gi and Nogi)
  • Wrestling
  • Judo
  • Wing Chun
